Doc: A type for defining exercise procedures associated with a Bermuda style exercise of an equity option. The term Bermuda is adopted in FpML for consistency with the ISDA Definitions.

Source.Contents:
/#
   A type for defining exercise procedures associated with a Bermuda style exercise of an equity option. The term Bermuda is adopted in FpML for consistency with the ISDA Definitions.
 #/
record FpML5.transparency.EquityBermudaExercise {
  # The first day of the exercise period for an American style option.
  commencementDate : FpML5.transparency.AdjustableOrRelativeDate?

  # The last day within an exercise period for an American style option. For a European style option it is the only day within the exercise period.
  expirationDate : FpML5.transparency.AdjustableOrRelativeDate

  # List of Exercise Dates for a Bermuda option.
  bermudaExerciseDates : FpML5.transparency.DateList?

  # The latest time of day at which the equity option can be exercised, for example the official closing time of the exchange.
  latestExerciseTimeType : string?

  # The time of day at which the equity option expires, for example the official closing time of the exchange.
  equityExpirationTimeType : string?

  # The specific time of day at which the equity option expires.
  equityExpirationTime : FpML5.transparency.BusinessCenterTime?

  # Expiration time determination method.
  expirationTimeDetermination : string

  # The presence of this element indicates that the option may be exercised on different days. It is not applicable to European options.
  equityMultipleExercise : FpML5.transparency.EquityMultipleExercise?

  id : string?

}

commencementDate.Doc: The first day of the exercise period for an American style option.
commencementDate.Name: commencementDate

expirationDate.Doc: The last day within an exercise period for an American style option. For a European style option it is the only day within the exercise period.
expirationDate.Name: expirationDate

bermudaExerciseDates.Doc: List of Exercise Dates for a Bermuda option.
bermudaExerciseDates.Name: bermudaExerciseDates

latestExerciseTimeType.Doc: The latest time of day at which the equity option can be exercised, for example the official closing time of the exchange.
latestExerciseTimeType.Name: latestExerciseTimeType

equityExpirationTimeType.Doc: The time of day at which the equity option expires, for example the official closing time of the exchange.
equityExpirationTimeType.Name: equityExpirationTimeType

equityExpirationTime.Doc: The specific time of day at which the equity option expires.
equityExpirationTime.Name: equityExpirationTime

equityMultipleExercise.Doc: The presence of this element indicates that the option may be exercised on different days. It is not applicable to European options.
equityMultipleExercise.Name: equityMultipleExercise
